This is the same exact source, but yes I do have to say this is a little bit brighter looking and the audio is just a little better, so for the review for a cam rip on this compared to the 26k version, V:6 A:7 (Only reason better audio is the cleanup)

Folks just remember until it has been out for more than about 3-4 weeks, you won't find a decent rip for newest movies, you just either wait a few weeks before getting it or you can deal with what you get as a cam rip. Regardless nice work .bone.

I think Darkseid007 was altogether too kind.  most of these cam movies are pretty good (and, I know, what do you want for free)... but this one is terrible.  The opening minutes are like A & V: about 3.  Then the Video stays at 3, while the Audio jumps up to about 4.5 or 5.  I would wait for a better copy, unless you don't mind ruining your child's eyes.

I don't know if you have this when you are at a theatre but an usher does his walk of the aisles at least 2 to 3 times during the movie looking for anyone using a cam corder. We always sit in the top row. I thought he was looking to see if we were "misbehaving". lol
